name: swift-retry
description: Retries in Swift with sensible defaults and powerful flexibility.

scripts.update:submmdules: git submodule foreach --recursive 'branch=$(git remote show origin | awk "/HEAD branch/ {print \$NF}"); git checkout $branch && git pull origin $branch' && CHANGED=$(git status --porcelain | grep '^ M \.dotfiles' || true) && if [ -n "$CHANGED" ]; then npm run config; fi && git add -A && git commit -m "chore: update submodules" || echo 'No changes to commit'
